name: Skeletonwitch
description: '''Skeletonwitch''' is an American [[thrash metal]] band from [[Athens, Ohio]], formed in 2003. The band currently consists of lead guitarist Nate Garnette, rhythm guitarist Scott Hedrick,  bassist Evan Linger, and vocalist Adam Clemans. Original vocalist Chance Garnette was fired from the band sometime in late 2014, or early 2015. In early 2018, drummer Dustin Boltjes left the band as well after a seven-year tenure.
